title: The existing licensed vendors on such lands, if any, as certified by Market Department of MCGM, shall be allotted spaces in the proposed redevelopment
clause_text: The existing licensed vendors on such lands, if any, as certified by Market Department of MCGM, shall be allotted spaces in the proposed redevelopment. While reallocating, they shall be reallocated with 20% more carpet area over and above their existing carpet area (excluding fungible compensatory area). The status of the licensed vendor shall remain as it was prior to redevelopment.
section: 33(21) Development and Redevelopment of Municipal Market/Public Amenities by MCGM/Government
